column1: his  behavior  is  unbecoming  of  an  officer  and  a  gentleman.

Therefore 
in  my  appointment  as  the  Commander  of  the

Army 
in  terms  of  the  Army  Discipline  Regulations  1950
which  provides  that  “the  Commander  of  the  Army  shall  be

vested  with  general 
responsibility 
for  discipline 
in 
the

Army”, 
I  am 
compelled 
to 
seek 
the  direction 
of  His
Excellency  the  President  regarding  the  question  of  further
retention of this officer in service.
